name: Historic Downtown District
description: Explore our charming historic downtown with Victorian architecture, boutique shops, and local restaurants. Perfect for evening strolls and weekend shopping.
alt: Historic downtown street with Victorian buildings

name: Riverside Park & Marina
description: A beautiful waterfront park featuring walking trails, boat rentals, and picnic areas. Enjoy stunning sunset views and family-friendly activities.
alt: Scenic riverside park with marina and walking trails

name: Heritage Museum
description: Discover our local history through interactive exhibits, artifacts, and guided tours. Learn about the pioneers who shaped our community.
alt: Heritage museum building with colonial architecture

name: Artisan Market Square
description: Weekly farmers market and artisan fair featuring local produce, handcrafted goods, and live music. Open Saturdays year-round.
alt: Bustling artisan market with vendors and shoppers

name: Greenway Trail System
description: Over 15 miles of paved trails connecting parks, neighborhoods, and business districts. Perfect for cycling, walking, and commuting.
alt: Paved walking trail through green parkland

name: Innovation Business Park
description: Modern business campus housing tech startups and established companies. Features conference facilities and collaborative workspaces.
alt: Modern office buildings in business park setting

name: Community Arts Center
description: Hub for performing and visual arts featuring theater productions, art galleries, and educational workshops for all ages.
alt: Modern arts center building with glass facade

name: Mountain View Golf Course
description: Championship 18-hole golf course with panoramic mountain views. Includes pro shop, restaurant, and event facilities.
alt: Golf course fairway with mountain backdrop
